title: Bracketron TekGrip Windshield Mount, Dashboard and Windshield Phone Holder for Car, Black (BT1-642-2)
features: DASHBOARD & WINDSHIELD MOUNT: The TekGrip mount makes it easy for you or your passengers to access electronic devices in your vehicle hands-free. The flexible neck rotates to any angle on your dashboard, and the powerful suction holds it to any car windshield. Mount dimensions are 5" x 6.9" x 4.2".

ADJUSTABLE FIT: The TekGrip can hold any smartphone, GPS, tablet, or electronic device up to 3.5" wide in its grip. The easy one-button expansion helps to adjust the fit of the clamp, and folding legs are included for added support.

COMFORTABLE VIEW: The mount’s 360-degree rotation gives you a portrait or landscape view of your screen. The flexible gooseneck makes it easy to bring things close enough to prevent squinting. The thick, rigid neck also limits vibration, keeping your device and accessories secure on the road.

EASY TO INSTALL & USE: Press the base lever down to create suction and attach the mount to the windshield. To remove dirt and dust on the base, just wash the suction cup with warm soapy water and air-dry.

BRACKETRON’S MISSION: Our mounts and accessories are designed to keep professional drivers and casual commuters safe and connected on the road. We offer a variety of products that are flexible, functional, and easy to use, no matter what kind of device you travel with.
description: "The black TekGrip Windshield Mount is the perfect car phone holder for long trips. It has a thick, flexible gooseneck that adjusts to any angle while limiting vibration, so your device stays secure on the road. This mount can fit any handheld electronic up to 3.5" wide. An easy one-button expansion helps to adjust the fit of the clamp, and folding legs are included for added support. The lever at the mount base creates enough suction to keep it attached to any windshield. You can also install it to your dashboard or remove it altogether to keep it out of the public eye.The TekGrip mount has 360-degree rotation capability, so you or your passenger can get a landscape or portrait view of your device. No more squinting to see or straining to reach the screen. Just adjust the long neck to bring your smartphone, GPS, camera, or tablet as close as needed. This mount is flexible, functional, and as easy to care for as it is to use. If any dirt or dust gets on the base, just wash the suction cup with warm soapy water and air-dry. The mount dimensions are 5" x 6.9" x 4.2". We provide heavy-duty mounts and accessories for all types of drivers and their devices. Founded in 2001, Bracketron is focused on becoming your first choice for user-friendly mounting solutions. If you need a holder for a smartphone, tablet, GPS, or camera, our range of products will always be there to help you stay safe and connected while on the go."
